content:
Hi,

We are trying to map the Medicaid Number and Tax number of clinic as identifiers in the Organization resource as specified below, These seems to be very common attributes/identifiers in Health Care industry, but I couldn't find a suitable identifier system (highlighted below). Can you please suggest any standard identifier systems to use or provide any links to find this information?

Please note we are using STU3 (v 3.0.2) FHIR version.

"identifier": [ {
"type": {
"coding": [ {
"system": "http://hl7.org/fhir/v2/0203",
"code": "MD",
"display": "Medicaid Number"
} ]
},
"system": "????????",
"value": "XXXXXX - PA"
},
{
"type": {
"coding": [ {
"system": "http://hl7.org/fhir/v2/0203",
"code": "TXN",
"display": "Tax Number"
} ]
},
"system": "????????",
"value": "0X-XXXX"
}
]

Regards,
-Ajay
I think you should ask on #united states
The system URI for tax number is urn:oid:2.16.840.1.113883.4.4 (see for example http://hl7.org/fhir/us/davinci-deqm/2018Sep/STU3/StructureDefinition-organization-deqm.html)
Never saw one for Medicaid number (aren't they state-specific though?)

Saw this in an example somewhere
"
""""identifier"""": [
{
""""use"""": """"official"""",
""""type"""": {
""""coding"""": [
{
""""system"""": """"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0203"""",
""""code"""": """"NPI"""",
""""display"""": """"National provider identifier""""
}
]
},
""""system"""": """"http://hl7.org.fhir/sid/us-npi"""",
""""value"""": """"1003802679""""
},
{
""""use"""": """"official"""",
""""type"""": {
""""coding"""": [
{
""""system"""": """"http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-0203"""",
""""code"""": """"TAX"""",
""""display"""": """"Tax Id Number""""
}
]
},
""""system"""": """"http://www.irs.gov/"""",
""""value"""": """"12-1234567""""
}
],"""
Seeing it an example doesn't mean it's right. If it's not listed in THO, then you should ask the HTA. Anything else is unofficial and risky.
Ajay Chada has marked this topic as resolved.
Ajay Chada has marked this topic as resolved.
